QuestData.Title: Harp on This!
QuestData.Description: $C, did you see that? That's the harpy that's been leading the attack on our shipments to the gate! I've seen her in the back of Coldwind Heights before.$B$B Those harpies have slowed our profits long enough! Kill them all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Mistress of the Coldwind and 15 Coldwind harpies in the mountains northwest of Nozzlerust Post. Return to Narf once the task is complete.$B$BShould you be in need of Xink's Shredder Control Device, speak to Xink at Nozzlerust Post.
QuestData.CompletionText: I remember you. You're not dead, so those harpy wenches better be.
QuestData.RewardText: That should make those uglies think twice. Here... take your reward and get away with ya.
